_comment: Windows 64-bit build profile for MinGW-w64 toolchain with CPU-only support
_description: This profile builds DupFinder for Windows x64 using LLVM-MinGW compiler without GPU acceleration
_local_setup_notes: IMPORTANT: Update paths below to match YOUR local installation
See LOCAL_SETTINGS.md for this machine's configuration
1. Qt6_DIR: Your Qt 6.9.3 LLVM-MinGW installation folder
2. path: MinGW bin directory (for gcc, g++, mingw32-make)
Note: This machine uses LLVM-MinGW variant bundled with Qt
MinGW builds do not require Visual Studio

targets.notes: Uses LLVM-MinGW toolchain bundled with Qt 6.9.3. No Visual Studio required. Open-source alternative to MSVC.
